tooltip.scintilla.t0nutrition: About as filling as a cookie... somehow.

tooltip.scintilla.t0durability: Would make some good bottles for holding Scintilla.
tooltip.scintilla.t1durability: Seems to have some very minor space warping abilities.
tooltip.scintilla.t2durability: Seems to have some small space warping abilities.
tooltip.scintilla.t3durability: Seems to have some decent space warping abilities.
tooltip.scintilla.t4durability: Seems to have some powerful space warping abilities.
tooltip.scintilla.t5durability: Seems to have some extremely powerful space warping abilities. It's... difficult to hold.
